entry.title: Russia trying to weaken Armenia through conflict with Azerbaijan, says Macron

media:group.media:title: Russia trying to weaken Armenia through conflict with Azerbaijan, says Macron
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenia expects to sign both a peace treaty and a separate border delimitation deal with Azerbaijan by the end of the year, according to Armen Grigoryan, the Secretary of Armenia‚Äôs Security Council. üìçFrench President Emmanuel Macron accused Russia of meddling and attempting to destabilize the South Caucasus region. üìçThe Collective Security Treaty Organization, a Russian-led military alliance, is ‚Äúready‚Äù to dispatch its own observers to the Armenia-Azerbaijan border, Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov said.

media:group.media:title: Armenia and the fear factor
media:group.media:description:
In the latest edition of #InsightsWithEricHacopian, Eric discusses the recent negotiations in Prague between Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan and the Azerbaijani and Turkish presidents. Eric also talks about Armenia‚Äôs recent economic growth figures and how to overcome the fear in Armenian society.

entry.title: New video emerges of Azerbaijani soldiers executing Armenian POWs

media:group.media:title: New video emerges of Azerbaijani soldiers executing Armenian POWs
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenian Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan will participate in a tripartite meeting with his Azerbaijani and Russian counterparts on Friday in Astana, Kazakhstan.
üìçA new video emerged online showing Azerbaijani soldiers extrajudicially executing Armenian prisoners of war.
üìçArmenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan held talks with Karabakh President Arayik Harutyunyan in Yerevan, as Karabakh‚Äôs leadership seeks clarification over a future peace treaty with Azerbaijan.

entry.title: A young Armenian making strides in American politics

media:group.media:title: A young Armenian making strides in American politics
media:group.media:description:
Mari Manoogian is a Democratic member of the Michigan House of Representatives who gained notoriety in 2018 after flipping Michigan‚Äôs 40th district, which had been controlled by the Republican Party since at least the 1960s. Rep. Manoogian sat down with CivilNet to explain how to reach across the aisle in a polarized political atmosphere, discuss her advocacy for Armenian issues, and talk about her first-ever trip to Armenia.

entry.title: How has the Russian exodus to Armenia impacted the economy?

media:group.media:title: How has the Russian exodus to Armenia impacted the economy?
media:group.media:description:
Dr. Vache Gabrielyan, Dean of the Manoogian Simone College of Business and Economics at the American University of Armenia, sat down with CivilNet‚Äôs Mark Dovich to examine the impact of Russia‚Äôs mass exodus on Armenia‚Äôs economy. Dr. Gabrielyan previously served as Armenia‚Äôs Deputy Prime Minister and Finance Minister, among other high-ranking positions.
0:00 Why has Armenia‚Äôs economy done better than expected this year? 8:30 Is Armenia‚Äôs economic growth sustainable in the long run? 13:00 How should the Armenian government respond to the Russian exodus? 18:00 What does a stronger dram currency mean for Armenia?
